column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////As far as the Spicy Umami Miso Ramen is concerned
column2: we agree that the naming convention is confusing. However
column3: as a franchise concept we are not allowed to change the names of our dishes that have been decided upon by our corporate headquarters. Also
column4: regarding the up charge to make it spicy
column5: this has been a longstanding policy for all of our ramen bowls
column6: except for the Spicy Chicken Ramen and the Tonkotsu Spicy. These are the only two ramen bowls that require guests to choose Mild
